role.label: Accounts Payable, Current
role.documentation: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

role.label: Accounts Payable [Member]
role.documentation: Obligations incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received.

role.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current

role.label: Accrued Income Taxes, Current
role.documentation: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all currently due domestic and foreign income tax obligations.

role.label: Accrued Income Taxes, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all domestic and foreign income tax obligations due beyond one year or the operating cycle, whichever is longer. Alternate captions include income taxes payable, noncurrent.

role.terseLabel: Accrued expenses and other current liabilities

role.label: Accrued Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

role.totalLabel: Total cash, cash equivalents, and marketable securities
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, and Short-Term Investments
role.documentation: Cash includes currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. It also includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits in that the customer may deposit additional funds at any time and effectively may withdraw funds at any time without prior notice or penalty. Cash equivalents, excluding items classified as marketable securities, include short-term, highly liquid Investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash, and so near their maturity that they present minimal risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months. Short-term investments, exclusive of cash equivalents, generally consist of marketable securities intended to be sold within one year (or the normal operating cycle if longer) and may include trading securities, available-for-sale securities, or held-to-maturity securities (if maturing within one year), as applicable.

role.periodStartLabel: Cash and cash equivalents at beginning of period
role.periodEndLabel: Cash and cash equivalents at end of period
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents
role.documentation: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.totalLabel: Net increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.label: Concentration Risk Type [Domain]
role.documentation: For an entity that discloses a concentration risk as a percentage of some financial balance or benchmark, identifies the type (for example, asset, liability, net assets, geographic, customer, employees, supplier, lender) of the concentration.

role.label: Consolidated Entities [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by consolidated entity or group of entities.

role.label: Consolidated Entities [Domain]
role.documentation: Entity or group of entities consolidated into reporting entity.

role.label: Consolidation Items [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by components, eliminations, non-segment corporate-level activity and reconciling items used in consolidating a parent entity and its subsidiaries or its operating segments.

role.label: Consolidation Items [Domain]
role.documentation: Components, elimination, non-segment corporate-level activity and reconciling items used in consolidating a parent entity and its subsidiaries or its operating segments.

role.label: Consolidation, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy regarding (1) the principles it follows in consolidating or combining the separate financial statements, including the principles followed in determining the inclusion or exclusion of subsidiaries or other entities in the consolidated or combined financial statements and (2) its treatment of interests (for example, common stock, a partnership interest or other means of exerting influence) in other entities, for example consolidation or use of the equity or cost methods of accounting. The accounting policy may also address the accounting treatment for intercompany accounts and transactions, noncontrolling interest, and the income statement treatment in consolidation for issuances of stock by a subsidiary.

role.label: Consolidation, Variable Interest Entity, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for consolidation to describe the significant judgments and assumptions made in determining whether a variable interest held by the entity requires the variable interest entity to be consolidated and (or) disclose information about its involvement with the variable interest entity; the methodology used by the entity for determining whether or not it is the primary beneficiary of the variable interest entity; and the significant factors considered and judgments made in determining that the power to direct the activities that significantly impact the economic performance of the variable interest entity are shared (as defined).

role.terseLabel: Add: assets not yet in service
role.label: Construction in Progress, Gross
role.documentation: Amount of structure or a modification to a structure under construction. Includes recently completed structures or modifications to structures that have not been placed into service.

role.label: Contract with Customer, Liability
role.documentation: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

role.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
role.documentation: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

role.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Revenue Recognized
role.documentation: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

role.terseLabel: Preferred stock, $0.001 par value per share, 100 shares authorized; no shares issued and outstanding
role.label: Convertible Preferred Stock, Nonredeemable or Redeemable, Issuer Option, Value
role.documentation: Value of outstanding nonredeemable convertible preferred stock or outstanding convertible preferred stock that is redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

role.label: Corporate And Other Assets [Member]
role.documentation: Corporate And Other Assets

role.label: Corporate Debt Securities [Member]
role.documentation: Debt securities issued by domestic or foreign corporate business, banks and other entities with a promise of repayment.

role.label: Segment Reporting, Reconciling Item, Corporate Nonsegment [Member]
role.documentation: Corporate headquarters or functional department that may not earn revenues or may earn revenues that are only incidental to the activities of the entity and is not considered an operating segment.

role.label: Cost of Revenue
role.documentation: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

role.label: Costs and Expenses
role.documentation: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

role.label: Cover [Abstract]
role.documentation: Cover page.

role.label: Credit Facility [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of credit facility. Credit facilities provide capital to borrowers without the need to structure a loan for each borrowing.

role.label: Credit Facility [Domain]
role.documentation: Type of credit facility. Credit facilities provide capital to borrowers without the need to structure a loan for each borrowing.

role.label: Credit Facility Due April 2025 [Member]
role.documentation: Credit Facility Due April 2025

role.label: Credit Facility Due April 2026 [Member]
role.documentation: Credit Facility Due April 2026

role.label: Credit Facility Due April 2028 [Member]
role.documentation: Credit Facility Due April 2028

role.label: Credit Facility Due April 2030 [Member]
role.documentation: Credit Facility Due April 2030

role.terseLabel: Cumulative net gains (losses) on equity securities sold
role.label: Cumulative Net Gain (Loss) On Equity Securities Sold [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Cumulative Net Gain (Loss) On Equity Securities Sold

role.label: Current Fiscal Year End Date
role.documentation: End date of current fiscal year in the format --MM-DD.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Loss (gain) on debt and equity securities, net
role.label: Debt and Equity Securities, Gain (Loss)
role.documentation: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

role.label: Debt Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for information about short-term and long-term debt arrangements, which includes amounts of borrowings under each line of credit, note payable, commercial paper issue, bonds indenture, debenture issue, own-share lending arrangements and any other contractual agreement to repay funds, and about the underlying arrangements, rationale for a classification as long-term, including repayment terms, interest rates, collateral provided, restrictions on use of assets and activities, whether or not in compliance with debt covenants, and other matters important to users of the financial statements, such as the effects of refinancing and noncompliance with debt covenants.

role.label: Debt Instrument [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of debt instrument, including, but not limited to, draws against credit facilities.

role.totalLabel: Total face value of long-term debt
role.label: Long-Term Debt, Gross
role.documentation: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

role.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Effective Percentage
role.documentation: Effective interest rate for the funds borrowed under the debt agreement considering interest compounding and original issue discount or premium.

role.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Stated Percentage
role.documentation: Contractual interest rate for funds borrowed, under the debt agreement.

role.label: Debt Instrument [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Debt Instrument, Name [Domain]
role.documentation: The name for the particular debt instrument or borrowing that distinguishes it from other debt instruments or borrowings, including draws against credit facilities.

role.label: Schedule of Long-Term Debt Instruments [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about long-term debt instrument or arrangement.

role.terseLabel: Unamortized discount and debt issuance costs
role.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount (Premium) and Debt Issuance Costs, Net
role.documentation: Amount of unamortized debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

role.negatedTerseLabel: (Increase) decrease in allowance for credit losses
role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer
role.documentation: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for more than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Accumulated Loss
role.documentation: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months
role.documentation: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Accumulated Loss
role.documentation: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

role.totalLabel: Total gain (loss) on debt securities recognized in other income (expense), net
role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss)
role.documentation: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.terseLabel: Gross realized gain on debt securities
role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Realized Gain
role.documentation: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.negatedTerseLabel: Gross realized loss on debt securities
role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Realized Loss
role.documentation: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Loss Position
role.documentation: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position without allowance for credit loss.

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Loss Position, Accumulated Loss
role.documentation: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

role.terseLabel: Debt securities, available-for-sale, unrealized loss position, fair value
role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Loss Position, Fair Value [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

role.label: Debt Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
role.documentation: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

role.label: Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate
role.documentation: Weighted average interest rate of debt outstanding.

role.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
role.documentation: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

role.label: Deferred Income Taxes and Tax Credits
role.documentation: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) and income tax credits.

role.label: Depreciation
role.documentation: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of the cost of tangible assets over the assets' useful lives. Includes production and non-production related depreciation.

role.negatedLabel: Gross Amounts Offset in the Consolidated Balance Sheets
role.label: Derivative Asset, Subject to Master Netting Arrangement, Liability Offset
role.documentation: Fair value of liability associated with financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

role.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Offset Against Collateral, Net of Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement, Policy Election
role.documentation: Fair value, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, offset against an obligation to return collateral.

role.label: Derivative Asset, Subject to Master Netting Arrangement, Deduction of Financial Instrument Not Offset
role.documentation: Fair value of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and contract can be net settled by means outside contract or delivery of asset, subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement and not elected or qualified to offset, deducted from derivative asset.

role.terseLabel: Derivative Asset, Statement of Financial Position [Extensible Enumeration]
role.label: Derivative Asset, Statement of Financial Position [Extensible Enumeration]
role.documentation: Indicates line item in statement of financial position that includes derivative asset.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Cash and Non-Cash Collateral Received or Pledged
role.label: Derivative Asset, Subject To Master Netting Arrangement, Collateral, Obligation To Return Cash And Security Not Offset
role.documentation: Derivative Asset, Subject To Master Netting Arrangement, Collateral, Obligation To Return Cash And Security Not Offset

role.totalLabel: Net Amounts Presented in the Consolidated Balance Sheets
role.label: Derivative Asset
role.documentation: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

role.label: Derivative Contract [Domain]
role.documentation: Financial instrument or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

role.label: Derivative Asset, Subject to Master Netting Arrangement, before Offset
role.documentation: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

role.label: Derivative Liability, Subject to Master Netting Arrangement, before Offset
role.documentation: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

role.label: Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Derivative, Net
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

role.terseLabel: Derivative, Gain (Loss), Statement of Income or Comprehensive Income [Extensible Enumeration]
role.label: Derivative, Gain (Loss), Statement of Income or Comprehensive Income [Extensible Enumeration]
role.documentation: Indicates line item in statement of income or comprehensive income that includes gain (loss) from derivative.

role.label: Derivative Instrument [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of derivative contract.

role.label: Hedging Relationship [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of hedging relationship.

role.terseLabel: Derivative Instruments, Gain (Loss) by Hedging Relationship, by Income Statement Location, by Derivative Instrument Risk [Table]
role.label: Derivative Instruments, Gain (Loss) [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about the location and amount of derivative instruments and nonderivative instruments designated as hedging instruments reported before netting adjustments, and the amount of gain (loss) on derivative instruments and nonderivative instruments designated and qualified as hedging instruments.

role.label: Derivative Instruments, Gain (Loss) [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.terseLabel: Amount excluded from the assessment of effectiveness (amortized)
role.label: Derivative Instruments, Gain (Loss) Recognized In Income, Ineffective Portion And Amount Excluded From Effectiveness Testing, Amortization Approach, Net
role.documentation: Derivative Instruments, Gain (Loss) Recognized In Income, Ineffective Portion And Amount Excluded From Effectiveness Testing, Amortization Approach, Net

role.terseLabel: Derivatives not designated as hedging instruments
role.label: Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Gain (Loss), Net
role.documentation: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) of derivative instruments not designated or qualifying as hedging instruments.

role.totalLabel: Net Amounts Presented in the Consolidated Balance Sheets
role.label: Derivative Liability
role.documentation: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Gross Amounts Offset in the Consolidated Balance Sheets
role.label: Derivative Liability, Subject to Master Netting Arrangement, Asset Offset
role.documentation: Fair value of asset associated with financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

role.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Offset Against Collateral, Net of Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement, Policy Election
role.documentation: Fair value, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, offset against the right to receive collateral.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Financial Instruments
role.label: Derivative Liability, Subject to Master Netting Arrangement, Deduction of Financial Instrument Not Offset
role.documentation: Fair value of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and contract can be net settled by means outside contract or delivery of asset, subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement and not elected or qualified to offset, deducted from derivative liability.

role.terseLabel: Derivative Liability, Statement of Financial Position [Extensible Enumeration]
role.label: Derivative Liability, Statement of Financial Position [Extensible Enumeration]
role.documentation: Indicates line item in statement of financial position that includes derivative liability.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Cash and Non-Cash Collateral Received or Pledged
role.label: Derivative Liability, Subject To Master Netting Arrangement, Collateral, Right To Reclaim Cash And Security Not Offset
role.documentation: Derivative Liability, Subject To Master Netting Arrangement, Collateral, Right To Reclaim Cash And Security Not Offset

role.label: Derivative, Notional Amount
role.documentation: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payment on derivative.

role.terseLabel: Foreign exchange option contracts, maximum maturities
role.label: Derivative, Remaining Maturity
role.documentation: Period remaining until the derivative contract matures, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents the reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.

role.label: Derivatives, Fair Value [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Derivatives Not Designated as Cash Flow Hedges, Foreign Exchange Contracts [Abstract]
role.documentation: Derivatives Not Designated as Cash Flow Hedges, Foreign Exchange Contracts [Abstract]

role.label: Designated as Hedging Instrument [Member]
role.documentation: Derivative instrument designated as hedging instrument under Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP).

role.terseLabel: Schedule of revenue by revenue source
role.label: Disaggregation of Revenue [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of disaggregation of revenue into categories depicting how nature, amount, timing, and uncertainty of revenue and cash flows are affected by economic factor.

role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for share-based payment arrangement.

role.terseLabel: Allocation of distributed earnings (cash dividends paid)
role.label: Distributed Earnings
role.documentation: The total amount of dividends declared in the period for each class of stock and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid for the period (for example, unpaid cumulative dividends). Dividends declared in the current period do not include dividends declared in respect of prior-period unpaid cumulative dividends. Preferred dividends that are cumulative only if earned are deducted only to the extent that they are earned.

role.label: Dividends
role.documentation: Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind (PIK) dividends declared, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred stock.

role.label: Document Fiscal Period Focus
role.documentation: Fiscal period values are FY, Q1, Q2, and Q3. 1st, 2nd and 3rd quarter 10-Q or 10-QT statements have value Q1, Q2, and Q3 respectively, with 10-K, 10-KT or other fiscal year statements having FY.

role.label: Document Fiscal Year Focus
role.documentation: This is focus fiscal year of the document report in YYYY format. For a 2006 annual report, which may also provide financial information from prior periods, fiscal 2006 should be given as the fiscal year focus. Example: 2006.

role.label: Document Information [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Document Period End Date
role.documentation: For the EDGAR submission types of Form 8-K: the date of the report, the date of the earliest event reported; for the EDGAR submission types of Form N-1A: the filing date; for all other submission types: the end of the reporting or transition period. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD.

role.label: Document Quarterly Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as an quarterly report.

role.label: Document Transition Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as a transition report.

role.label: Document Type
role.documentation: The type of document being provided (such as 10-K, 10-Q, 485BPOS, etc). The document type is limited to the same value as the supporting SEC submission type, or the word 'Other'.

role.terseLabel: Dividends or Other Earnings Paid on Equity Awards not Otherwise Reflected in Total Compensation for Covered Year
role.label: Dividends or Other Earnings Paid on Equity Awards not Otherwise Reflected in Total Compensation for Covered Year [Member]
EMEA [Member]
role.documentation: Regions of Europe, Middle East and Africa.

role.verboseLabel: Basic net income per share (in dollars per share)
role.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
role.documentation: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

role.verboseLabel: Diluted net income per share (in dollars per share)
role.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
role.documentation: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

role.label: Earnings Per Share Disclosure [Line Items]
role.documentation: Earnings Per Share Disclosure [Line Items]

role.label: Earnings Per Share Disclosure [Table]
role.documentation: Earnings Per Share Disclosure [Table]

role.label: Earnings Per Share [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for earnings per share.

role.label: Effect of Cash Flow Hedges on Results of Operations [Abstract]

role.terseLabel: Effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents
role.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Continuing Operations
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies. Excludes amounts for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.label: Effect of Fair Value Hedges on Results of Operations [Abstract]
Effect of Net Investment Hedge on Results of Operations [Abstract]
Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

role.label: Effect of Derivatives Not Designated as Cash Flow Hedges on Results of Operations [Abstract]
role.documentation: Effect of Derivatives Not Designated as Cash Flow Hedges on Results of Operations [Abstract]

role.label: Employee-related Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Total of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of cost not yet recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.terseLabel: Weighted average recognition period for unrecognized stock-based compensation expense
role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Period for Recognition
role.documentation: Weighted-average period over which cost not yet recognized is expected to be recognized for award under share-based payment arrangement, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.

role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Option [Member]
role.documentation: Share-based payment arrangement granting right, subject to vesting and other restrictions, to purchase or sell certain number of shares at predetermined price for specified period of time.

role.label: Entities [Table]
role.documentation: Container to assemble all relevant information about each entity associated with the document instance

role.label: Entity Address, Address Line One
role.documentation: Address Line 1 such as Attn, Building Name, Street Name

role.label: Entity Address, City or Town
role.documentation: Name of the City or Town

role.label: Entity Address, Postal Zip Code
role.documentation: Code for the postal or zip code

role.label: Entity Address, State or Province
role.documentation: Name of the state or province.

role.label: Entity Central Index Key
role.documentation: A unique 10-digit SEC-issued value to identify entities that have filed disclosures with the SEC. It is commonly abbreviated as CIK.

role.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
role.documentation: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

role.label: Entity Current Reporting Status
role.documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' whether registrants (1) have filed all reports required to be filed by Section 13 or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that registrants were required to file such reports), and (2) have been subject to such filing requirements for the past 90 days. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

role.label: Entity Emerging Growth Company
role.documentation: Indicate if registrant meets the emerging growth company criteria.

role.label: Entity File Number
role.documentation: Commission file number. The field allows up to 17 characters. The prefix may contain 1-3 digits, the sequence number may contain 1-8 digits, the optional suffix may contain 1-4 characters, and the fields are separated with a hyphen.

role.label: Entity Filer Category
role.documentation: Indicate whether the registrant is one of the following: Large Accelerated Filer, Accelerated Filer, Non-accelerated Filer. Definitions of these categories are stated in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

role.terseLabel: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
role.label: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
role.documentation: Two-character EDGAR code representing the state or country of incorporation.

role.label: Entity Interactive Data Current
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant has submitted electronically every Interactive Data File required to be submitted pursuant to Rule 405 of Regulation S-T during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that the registrant was required to submit such files).

role.label: Entity Registrant Name
role.documentation: The exact name of the entity filing the report as specified in its charter, which is required by forms filed with the SEC.

role.label: Entity Shell Company
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant is a shell company as defined in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act.

role.label: Entity Small Business
role.documentation: Indicates that the company is a Smaller Reporting Company (SRC).

role.label: Entity Tax Identification Number
role.documentation: The Tax Identification Number (TIN), also known as an Employer Identification Number (EIN), is a unique 9-digit value assigned by the IRS.

role.terseLabel: Equity Awards Adjustments, Excluding Value Reported in Compensation Table
role.label: Equity Awards Adjustments, Excluding Value Reported in the Compensation Table [Member]

role.terseLabel: Aggregate Grant Date Fair Value of Equity Award Amounts Reported in Summary Compensation Table
role.label: Aggregate Grant Date Fair Value of Equity Award Amounts Reported in Summary Compensation Table [Member]
Equity Component [Domain]

role.label: Line of Credit, Current
role.documentation: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current portion of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt classified as current. Excludes lease obligation.

role.terseLabel: Estimated fair value of long-term debt
role.label: Long-Term Debt, Fair Value
role.documentation: The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt classified as noncurrent. Excludes lease obligation.

role.label: Loss Contingency Nature [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of existing condition, situation, or set of circumstances involving uncertainty as to possible loss to an enterprise that will ultimately be resolved when one or more future events occur or fail to occur.

role.label: Loss Contingencies [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Loss Contingencies [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about loss contingency. Excludes environmental contingency, warranty, and unconditional purchase obligation.

role.label: Loss Contingency, Accrual, Current
role.documentation: Amount of loss contingency liability expected to be resolved within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Payments
role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow reducing loss contingency liability.

role.label: Loss Contingency, Loss in Period
role.documentation: The amount of loss pertaining to the specified contingency that was charged against earnings in the period, including the effects of revisions in previously reported estimates.

role.label: Loss Contingency, Loss In Period, Adjustment
role.documentation: Loss Contingency, Loss In Period, Adjustment

role.terseLabel: Loss contingency, loss in period, value annulled
role.label: Loss Contingency, Loss In Period, Value Annulled
role.documentation: Loss Contingency, Loss In Period, Value Annulled

role.label: Loss Contingency, Nature [Domain]
role.documentation: An existing condition, situation, or set of circumstances involving uncertainty as to possible loss to an enterprise that will ultimately be resolved when one or more future events occur or fail to occur. Resolution of the uncertainty may confirm the incurrence of a loss or impairment of an asset or the incurrence of a liability.

role.label: Valuation, Market Approach [Member]
role.documentation: Valuation approach using price and other relevant information generated by market transaction involving identical or comparable asset, liability, or group of assets and liabilities.

role.label: Marketable Equity Securities [Member]
role.documentation: Marketable Equity Securities

role.label: Marketable Securities, Current
role.documentation: Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as current.

role.terseLabel: Long-term portion of marketable equity securities
role.label: Marketable Securities, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as noncurrent.

role.label: Marketable Securities [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of marketable securities. This may consist of investments in certain debt and equity securities, short-term investments and other assets.

role.label: Maximum [Member]
role.documentation: Upper limit of the provided range.

role.label: Minimum [Member]
role.documentation: Lower limit of the provided range.

role.terseLabel: MNPI Disclosure Timed for Compensation Value
role.label: MNPI Disclosure Timed for Compensation Value [Flag]
Money Market Funds [Member]
role.documentation: Fund that invests in short-term money-market instruments, for example, but not limited to, commercial paper, banker's acceptances, repurchase agreements, government securities, certificates of deposit, and other highly liquid securities.

role.label: Mortgage Backed and Asset Backed Securities [Member]
role.documentation: Mortgage Backed and Asset Backed Securities [Member]

role.label: Material Terms of Trading Arrangement [Text Block]
Mutual Fund [Member]
role.documentation: Regulated investment instrument that pools funds from multiple investors to invest principally in a portfolio of securities and money market instruments to match the investment objective.

role.label: Nature Of Operations Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure related to our nature of operations.

role.totalLabel: Net cash used in financing activities
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities [Abstract]

role.totalLabel: Net cash used in investing activities
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities [Abstract]

role.totalLabel: Net cash provided by operating activities
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities [Abstract]
Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

role.verboseLabel: Allocation of total earnings for basic computation
role.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

role.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic [Abstract]
Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Diluted
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

role.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Diluted [Abstract]
Net Income [Member]
role.documentation: Net Income

role.label: Net Investment Hedge, Foreign Exchange Contracts [Abstract]
role.documentation: Net Investment Hedge, Foreign Exchange Contracts [Abstract]

role.label: Net Investment Hedging [Member]
role.documentation: Hedges of a net investment in a foreign operation.

role.negatedLabel: Net payments related to stock-based award activities
role.label: Net Proceeds Payments Related To Stock Based Award Activities
role.documentation: The net cash inflow (outflow) associated with the tax withholding payments on behalf of employees upon the net settlement of their vested restricted stock units, and the cash proceeds received from the exercise of stock options.

role.terseLabel: Recently Issued Accounting Pronouncements Not Yet Adopted
role.label: New Accounting Pronouncements, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy pertaining to new accounting pronouncements that may impact the entity's financial reporting. Includes, but is not limited to, quantification of the expected or actual impact.

role.label: Non-marketable Equity Securities [Abstract]
role.documentation: Non-marketable Equity Securities

role.label: Non-Marketable Securities, Without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Downward Price Adjustment
role.documentation: Non-Marketable Securities, Without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Downward Price Adjustment

role.label: Non-Marketable Securities, Without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Upward Price Adjustment
role.documentation: Non-Marketable Securities, Without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Upward Price Adjustment

role.terseLabel: Non-PEO NEO Average Compensation Actually Paid Amount
role.label: Non-PEO NEO Average Compensation Actually Paid Amount

role.terseLabel: Non-PEO NEO Average Total Compensation Amount
role.label: Non-PEO NEO Average Total Compensation Amount
Non-US [Member]
role.documentation: Countries excluding the United States of America (US).

role.label: Noncontrolling Interest in Variable Interest Entity
role.documentation: Portion of equity (net assets) in a variable interest entity (VIE) not attributable, directly or indirectly, to the parent entity. That is, this is the portion of equity in a VIE that is attributable to the noncontrolling interest (previously referred to as minority interest).

role.terseLabel: Sale of interest in consolidated entities
role.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Sale of Parent Equity Interest
role.documentation: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from sale of a portion of the parent's controlling interest.

role.label: Long-Lived Assets
role.documentation: Long-lived assets other than financial instruments, long-term customer relationships of a financial institution, mortgage and other servicing rights, deferred policy acquisition costs, and deferred tax assets.

role.verboseLabel: Derivatives not designated as hedging instruments:
role.label: Not Designated as Hedging Instrument [Member]
role.documentation: Derivative instrument not designated as hedging instrument under Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP).

role.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
role.documentation: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

role.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense) [Member]
role.documentation: Primary financial statement caption encompassing nonoperating income (expense).

role.label: Nonrecourse [Member]
role.documentation: Liability for which creditor does not have recourse to debtor but rather has recourse only to property used for collateral in transaction or other specific property.

role.label: Number Of Open Investigations
role.documentation: Number Of Open Investigations

role.label: OCI, before Reclassifications, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments, of other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to parent.

role.label: Office Space [Member]
role.documentation: Office Space

role.label: Offsetting Assets [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of derivative and other financial assets that are subject to offsetting, including master netting arrangements.

role.label: Offsetting Liabilities [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of derivative and other financial liabilities that are subject to offsetting, including master netting arrangements.

role.label: Operating Expenses
role.documentation: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

role.label: Operating Income (Loss)
role.documentation: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

role.label: Operating Lease, Cost
role.documentation: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.

role.label: Operating Lease, Liability
role.documentation: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

role.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
role.documentation: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

role.terseLabel: Operating Lease, Liability, Current, Statement of Financial Position [Extensible Enumeration]
role.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current, Statement of Financial Position [Extensible Enumeration]
role.documentation: Indicates line item in statement of financial position that includes current operating lease liability.

role.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

role.terseLabel: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent, Statement of Financial Position [Extensible Enumeration]
role.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent, Statement of Financial Position [Extensible Enumeration]
role.documentation: Indicates line item in statement of financial position that includes noncurrent operating lease liability.

role.terseLabel: Operating cash flows used for operating leases
role.label: Operating Lease, Payments
role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

role.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

role.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
role.documentation: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

role.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Remaining Lease Term
role.documentation: Weighted average remaining lease term for operating lease, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.

role.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Fiscal Year Maturity [Abstract]
Operating Segments [Member]
role.documentation: Identifies components of an entity that engage in business activities from which they may earn revenue and incur expenses, including transactions with other components of the same entity.

role.terseLabel: Organization, Consolidation and Presentation of Financial Statements [Abstract]
role.label: Organization, Consolidation and Presentation of Financial Statements [Abstract]

role.terseLabel: Other accrued expenses and current liabilities
role.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.documentation: Amount of current assets classified as other.

role.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

role.terseLabel: Derivatives in cash flow hedging relationship:

role.documentation: Location in other comprehensive income.

role.documentation: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

role.negatedLabel: Income tax benefit (expense) related to available-for-sale investments
role.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: Amount before tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

role.totalLabel: Net change, net of income tax benefit (expense) of $(23) and $131
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

role.negatedLabel: Income tax benefit (expense) related to cash flow hedges
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification, Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after reclassification, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification, after Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax and before reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

role.terseLabel: Amount included in the assessment of effectiveness
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification and Tax
role.documentation: Amount, before tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Less: reclassification adjustment for net (gains) losses included in net income
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, after Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

role.terseLabel: Amount reclassified from AOCI to income
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, before Tax
role.documentation: Amount, before tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

role.terseLabel: Amount excluded from the assessment of effectiveness
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), before Adjustments and Tax
role.documentation: Amount, before tax and adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

role.terseLabel: Change in foreign currency translation adjustment, net of income tax benefit (expense) of $(18) and $45
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
role.documentation: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

role.negatedLabel: Income tax benefit (expense) related to foreign currency translation adjustment
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment, Tax
role.documentation: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

role.terseLabel: Amount included in the assessment of effectiveness
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net Investment Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification and Tax
role.documentation: Amount, before tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative designated and qualifying as net investment hedge.

role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax [Abstract]

role.documentation: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Less: reclassification adjustment for net (gains) losses included in net income

role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) [Member]
role.documentation: Primary financial statement caption in which reported facts about other comprehensive income have been included.

role.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

role.label: Other Contract [Member]
role.documentation: Derivative instrument whose primary underlying risk is classified as other.

role.label: Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Other Long-Term Investments
role.documentation: Amount of long-term investments classified as other.

role.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
role.documentation: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

role.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
role.documentation: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

role.label: Other Revenue, Hedging Gain (Loss) [Member]
role.documentation: Other Revenue, Hedging Gain (Loss)

role.negatedTerseLabel: Other investing activities

role.negatedTerseLabel: Repurchases of stock

role.negatedTerseLabel: Dividend payments

role.label: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.

role.label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

role.documentation: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

role.label: Peer Group Total Shareholder Return Amount

role.documentation: Pledged or not pledged status of asset owned by entity.

role.terseLabel: Preferred stock, par value (in dollars per share)
role.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
role.documentation: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

role.documentation: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

role.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
role.documentation: Number of shares issued for nonredeemable preferred shares and preferred shares redeemable solely at option of issuer. Includes, but is not limited to, preferred shares issued, repurchased, and held as treasury shares. Excludes preferred shares classified as debt.

role.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
role.documentation: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for reclassification affecting comparability of financial statement. Excludes amendment to accounting standards, other change in accounting principle, and correction of error.

role.terseLabel: Proceeds from issuance of debt, net of costs
role.label: Proceeds from Debt, Net of Issuance Costs

role.terseLabel: Proceeds from sale of interest in consolidated entities, net
role.label: Proceeds from Noncontrolling Interests
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow from a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, purchase of additional shares or other increase in noncontrolling interest ownership.

role.terseLabel: Maturities and sales of marketable securities

Examples include land, buildings, machinery and equipment, and other types of furniture and equipment including, but not limited to, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment and software.

Includes, but is not limited to, disaggregation of revenue, credit loss recognized from contract with customer, judgment and change in judgment related to contract with customer, and asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer. Excludes insurance and lease contracts.

role.label: Schedule of Derivative Instruments [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of pertinent information about a derivative or group of derivatives on a disaggregated basis, such as for individual instruments, or small groups of similar instruments. May include a combination of the type of instrument, risks being hedged, notional amount, hedge designation, related hedged item, inception date, maturity date, or other relevant item.

role.label: Segment Reporting Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for reporting segments including data and tables. Reportable segments include those that meet any of the following quantitative thresholds a) it's reported revenue, including sales to external customers and intersegment sales or transfers is 10 percent or more of the combined revenue, internal and external, of all operating segments b) the absolute amount of its reported profit or loss is 10 percent or more of the greater, in absolute amount of 1) the combined reported profit of all operating segments that did not report a loss or 2) the combined reported loss of all operating segments that did report a loss c) its assets are 10 percent or more of the combined assets of all operating segments.

role.label: Variable Interest Entity, Primary Beneficiary [Member]
role.documentation: Variable Interest Entities (VIE) in which the entity has a controlling financial interest (as defined) and of which it is therefore the primary beneficiary. A controlling financial interest is determined based on both: (a) the entity's power to direct activities of the VIE that most significantly impact the VIE's economic performance and (b) the entity's obligation to absorb losses of the VIE that could potentially be significant to the VIE or the right to receive benefits from the VIE that could potentially be significant to the VIE. VIEs of which the entity is the primary beneficiary are included in the consolidated financial statements of the entity.
